body_html:
Say out is a vector (one dimension tensor) and I would like to define a softmax output from it called pi:

The way I am doing it now:

pi = tf.squeeze(tf.nn.softmax(tf.expand_dims(out, 0)), [0], name="pi")

The way I would like to do it:

pi = tf.nn.softmax(out, name="pi")
body_text:
Say out is a vector (one dimension tensor) and I would like to define a softmax output from it called pi:
The way I am doing it now:
pi = tf.squeeze(tf.nn.softmax(tf.expand_dims(out, 0)), [0], name="pi")

The way I would like to do it:
pi = tf.nn.softmax(out, name="pi")
body:
Say `out` is a vector (one dimension tensor) and I would like to define a softmax output from it called `pi`:

The way I am doing it now:

```
pi = tf.squeeze(tf.nn.softmax(tf.expand_dims(out, 0)), [0], name="pi")
```

The way I would like to do it:

```
pi = tf.nn.softmax(out, name="pi")
```
